Package gnat.filter.nei

Class Summary
AbbreviationFilter Tries to find long forms for short forms of gene names in a text.
AlignmentFilter Filter for recognized gene names based on the aligment score against candidate gene's synonyms.
DisambiguationFilter A disambiguation filter that picks among many candidate genes for a recognized gene name the one whose context fits best the context of the text.
GeneRepositoryLoader A filter that wraps GeneRepository loader methods, from GeneRepositoryFromDatabase and GeneFactory.
IdentifyAllFilter This filter "identifies" a gene name by forcing all remaining candidate IDs to be in the final prediction.
Gets all still unidentified gene names from the Context and sets each corresponding candidate ID as indentified.
ImmediateContextFilter Filters names by their immediate context (sentence).
LeftRightContextFilter Filters out names by looking at tokens to the left and right of it and comparing their occurrence against occurrences seen in a training set for TPs and FPs.
MultiSpeciesDisambiguationFilter Performs gene name disambiguation when genes of multiple species are sought.
NameValidationFilter Removes gene names that refer to families etc.
RecognizedEntityUnifier Merges recognized entities in a text to a single entity when they overlap or are adjacent to each other.
SimpleSpeciesDisambiguation A naive implementation of species disambiguation for gene names.

For each gene in a text, checks whether it occurs together with a species mention in the same sentence.
SpeciesValidationFilter Checks if the given gene is indeed discussed together (same sentence, same clause, ...) with the given species.

Input: gene ID, taxon ID, sentence, previous sentence, sentence0=title, sentence1=first sentence, abstract
Output: true or false...

Removes wrongly assigned gene IDs the candidate IDs of a RecognizedGeneName.
StopWordFilter This filter removes all recognized entities that use a stop word as their name.
StrictFPFilter Filters entities basesd on known false positives from a training set.
TfIdfFilter This filter removes all entities with a TF*IDF score below a threshold.
TfIdfFilterTest Only for testing!!! Example filter.
UnambiguousMatchFilter Identifies a recognized gene name if it has exactly one candidate ID (thus gene) assigned.
UnspecificNameFilter Also known as the CrazyRegExFilter.
 

Enum Summary
GeneRepositoryLoader.RetrievalMethod
